Title: Vanilla Sky
Writer: Alejandro Amenábar (film "Abre Los Ojos"), Mateo Gil (film "Abre Los Ojos"), Cameron Crowe (screenplay)
Actors: Tom Cruise, Penélope Cruz, Cameron Diaz, Kurt Russell
Plot: A self-indulgent and vain publishing magnate finds his privileged life upended after a vehicular accident with a resentful lover.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 5 wins & 33 nominations.
Production: Vinyl Films, Cruise-Wagner Productions, Paramount Pictures, Sogecine
